mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM patients p WHERE 1=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO patients ( first_name, last_name, fathers_name, mothers_name, birth_date, gender_code, marital_status_code, nationality_code, phone_number ) VALUES ( #{firstName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fathersName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mothersName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{genderCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maritalStatusCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nationalityCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_no = #{patientNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}
